content: At the end of the crevice, you’ll find an unusual looking stone. He’s actually a **Man-in-Stone** , and claims to have been trapped within the rock form. He’s betting on one of the rock guai in the large cave nearby to hold the secrets to reversing his fate, and **asks you to seek it out**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Man-in-Stone_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Man-in-Stone Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Man-in-Stone'.
The content is as follows:
At the end of the crevice, you’ll find an unusual looking stone. He’s actually a **Man-in-Stone** , and claims to have been trapped within the rock form. He’s betting on one of the rock guai in the large cave nearby to hold the secrets to reversing his fate, and **asks you to seek it out**.
